pages.text: And if your Lord had so willed, He could have made (all) mankind one People, but (even then) they will not stop disagreeing

Except those on whom your Lord has granted His Mercy: And for this did He create them: And the Word of your Lord (is that); "I will fill Hell with jinns' and men all together," has been (already) fulfilled

All that We reveal to you (O Muhammad) from the stories of the messengersâ€” With it We strengthen (and affirm) your heart: And in them comes to you the Truth, with a strong warning and a message to remember for those who believe
And say to those who do not believe: "Act according to your ability: We (too) are acting (in our own way)
And you wait! We will also wait

And to Allah belong the unseen (secrets) of the heavens and the earth, and to Him goes back every affair (for decision): So worship Him, and put your trust in Him: And your Lord is not unaware in the least of what you do
Alif Lam Ra: These are the Signs (Verses) of the Book that is (pure and) clear
Verily, We have sent it down as Arabic Quran, in order for you to (learn and) understand
We relate to you the most beautiful of stories; From these (stories) We make it known to you this (part of) Quran: And before this, you were also from those who did not know it
Remember, when Yusuf (Joseph) said to his father: "O my father! For sure, I saw (in my dream) eleven stars and the sun and the moon: I saw them prostrate themselves to me
